name: A Date to Die For
description:
Welcome to A Date to Die For, prime-time dating show for the perpetually unearthly wanting a change of pace. When the monsters want someone less monstrous in their various states of life, they go where nobody quite knows what's happening next. And maybe a mortal looking for something new might find it in a mummy, a bakeneko, or a 50-foot blob from outer space!

Enter Blake Tesson, tonight's mortal... who forgot about the fine-print. On the show and 17 ways out with a vampire, a witch, a fae, a werewolf, and a discount Steve Harvey... how will Blake make it out?

Controls

Arrow-keys: Navigate

Enter: Select

Escape: Alternate Option

Credits

Gamerunner: Samara-Jade Stewart

Incompetech: Happy Happy Gameshow

Purple Planet: Fizzy Jazz

Kyster: Crowd Laughter

TK Projects: Urban Slow Piano

Degica Co. & Kadokawa Corporation: RPG Maker MV
